actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Act of 2006 to provide for career and technical education research and outreach.
short_title: Career and Technical Education Research and Outreach Act of 2018

summary.text:
Career and Technical Education Research and Outreach Act of 2018

This bill directs the Department of Education to carry out research and evaluation activities with respect to the effectiveness of different delivery systems and approaches for career and technical education.
